appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.message: This app destroyes e-learning (and not only) AT ALL.
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

testportalLoading.description: A message in the console appears when the Testportal cheat is loaded.

quizizzLoading.description: A message in the console appears when the Quizizz cheat is loaded.

brainlyLoading.description: A message in the console appears when the Brainly cheat is loaded.

librusLoading.description: A message in the console appears when the Librus cheat is loaded.

testportalCheatQuestion.message: Do you want to activate Testportal cheats?
testportalCheatQuestion.description: Does user want to activate cheats for Testportal?

quizizzCheatQuestion.message: Do you want to activate Quizizz cheats?
quizizzCheatQuestion.description: Does user want to activate cheats for Quizizz?

brainlyCheatQuestion.message: Do you want to activate Brainly cheats?
brainlyCheatQuestion.description: Does user want to activate cheats for Brainly?

librusCheatQuestion.message: Do you want to activate Librus Synergia cheats?
librusCheatQuestion.description: Does user want to activate cheats for Librus Synergis?

cheatEnableLabel.message: Yes, I want to enable these cheats.
cheatEnableLabel.description: Question to the user if he wants to enable the cheat.

cheatOptionsHeader.description: If the cheat has available options, this string is shown in the header.

quizizzOptionsAutoAnswerLabel.message: Automatically answer the question after a given number of seconds.
quizizzOptionsAutoAnswerLabel.description: Option to automatically answer a question in the Quizizz cheat settings.

testportalOptionsTimeCheatLabel.message: Bypass time limit for tests where the time limit is set to a single question.
testportalOptionsTimeCheatLabel.description: EXPERIMENTAL option to bypass the time limit in the case of tests, where the time is set for a single question on Testportal.

quizizzWaitTimePromptLabel.message: Please enter the number of seconds to wait before each answer.
quizizzWaitTimePromptLabel.description: Prompt the user for the number of seconds to wait before each response for Quizizz Cheat.

invalidNumberError.message: The provided value is not a number. Make sure that you correctly set waiting time in CheatPack settings.
invalidNumberError.description: Invalid number error message for Quizizz Cheat.

experimentalWarning.message: WARNING! This function is experimental. It may have a negative impact on test and we cannot guarantee its correct functioning. USE IT AT YOUR OWN RISK!
experimentalWarning.description: Warning to the user saying that the use of a given function may be dangerous.

xhrError.message: An error occurred while retrieving information from the server. Please try again later.
xhrError.description: Message showing when an XHR error occurs.

netError.message: No Internet connection. For proper functioning, CheatPack requires an Internet connection. Check your connection and try again later.
netError.description: Message that appears to the user when CheatPack settings cannot connect to the Internet.

comments.description: Comments on a given cheat Label. [TRANSLATION]

specialThanks.description: Special thanks label in Informations page. [TRANSLATION]
